entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
